text: The 2019–20 Martyr's Memorial A-Division League (Nepali: शहीद स्मारक ए डिभिजन लिग २०७६) season, also known as the Qatar Airways Martyr's Memorial A-Division League for sponsorship reasons, will be the 43rd edition of the Martyr's Memorial A-Division League. Manang Marshyangdi Club were the defending champions. The season begun on 14 December and lasted for Two months. Machhindra Football Club were crowned as league winners for the first time in club's history on the 15 February, after defeating Nepal Army Club by 1–0. ==Teams== A total of 14 teams, all based in the Kathmandu Valley, will contest the league with a relegation system. === Location === {| class="wikitable sortable" !Team !Location !Previous Season |- |Himalayan Sherpa Club | rowspan="9" |Kathmandu |7th |- |Machhindra Football Club |13th |- |Manang Marshyangdi Club |1st |- |Nepal APF Club |5th |- |Nepal Army Club |4th |- |Nepal Police Club |6th |- |New Road Team | 14th |- |Sankata BSC |2nd |- |Saraswati Youth Club |9th |- |Brigade Boys Club | rowspan="5" |Lalitpur |12th |- |Chyasal Youth Club |8th |- |Friends Club |11th |- |Jawalakhel Youth Club |10th |- |Three Star Club |3rd |} === Personnel and kits === {| class="wikitable sortable" !Team !Head Coach !Captain !Kit Sponsor |- |Brigade Boys Club | Sanoj Shrestha | Anil Gurung |Nepal Investment Bank |- |Chyasal Youth Club | Bal Gopal Sahukhala | Santosh Sahukhala |Himalaya College of Engineering, Grace International |- |Friends Club | Marcos Filipe | Saroj Yonjan |Nepal Investment Bank |- |Himalayan Sherpa Club | Sanjeev Budhathoki | Man Bahadur Tamang |Yeti Airlines |- |Jawalakhel Youth Club | Naresh Thapa | Kuldeep Karki | Prabhu Bank |- |Machhindra Football Club | Prabesh Katuwal | Biraj Maharjan |San Miguel, Pepe Pizza |- |Manang Marshyangdi Club | Fuja Tope | Kamal Shrestha |Nepal Oil Corporation |- |Nepal APF Club | Rajendra Tamang | Top Bahadur Bista |Agni Mahindra |- |Nepal Army Club | Nabin Neupane | Bharat Khawas |Bajaj Pulsar |- |Nepal Police Club | Ananta Raj Thapa | Bhola Nath Silwal |Nepal Telecom |- |New Road Team | Raju Kaji Shakya | Prakash Budhathoki | |- |Sankata BSC | Salyan Khadgi | Saroj Dahal | |- |Saraswati Youth Club | Pradeep Nepal | Dipesh Shrestha | |- |Three Star Club | Megh Raj KC | Bikram Lama |Ruslan Vodka |} :1.
